bug.author: LeoIV
bug.summary: Value of `add_custom_layers` ignored for keras 2 converter
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>ğŸDescribe the bug</denchmark-h>
add_custom_layers without function for the Keras 2 converter (_keras2_converter.py) in function _convert. The value for add_custom_layers immediately gets overwritten: <denchmark-code># Check custom conversion functions / custom objects add_custom_layers = custom_conversion_functions is not None </denchmark-code>
If I understand add_custom_layers correctly, this is not the intended behavior. add_custom_layers is supposed to convert the model such that non-convertable layers have to be implemented later in CoreML. This functionality is separate from custom_conversion_functions.
